Text: According to I.N.D.U.C.K.S., one of the missing issues (#42) contained "Treasure of Marco Polo", which is a really good story. It was also printed (uncensored) in Uncle Scrooge 64 and Uncle Scrooge 134, though, so go and grab the Uncle Scrooge torrents if you can find them (I see them on isohunt, but it's not reporting any seeds).

RapidShare links for all the 'Uncle Scrooge' issues are available at the following location (registration required).
zcultfm.com/~comic/viewtopic.php?t=69104
Cheers for this and for the RS links!!!!!!
One of the missing issues, 53 at rapidshare dot com/files/70916609/Uncle_Scrooge_Adventures_053__1997__Jojo.cbr
